abstract: Texas orders Planned Parenthood clinics to turn over thousands of pages of documents, including patient records and personal information of employees; some records requested relate specifically to abortion; Planned Parenthood calls request politically motivated act in fight to outlaw abortion.
lead_paragraph: State health department investigators ordered women’s care centers to turn over documents, including patients’ records and employees’ home addresses and phone numbers.

headline.main: Texas Orders Health Clinics to Turn Over Patient Data
headline.print_headline: Texas Orders Health Clinics to Turn Over Patient Data

snippet: State health department investigators ordered women’s care centers to turn over documents, including patients’ records and employees’ home addresses and phone numbers.
